data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Vieques an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vieques, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 2,731 believers in Vieques to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Vieques, Puerto Rico to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Vieques, Puerto Rico will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Esperanza
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Esperanza, Vieques, Puerto Rico.
Lord we pray you unite the 2,731 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Vieques.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Vieques.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, provide a good translation of the Bible for the 2,731 believers in Vieques, Puerto Rico.
